category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 7 (Contractor's safety and health measures)
contents: Article 7 (Contractor's safety and health measures) When contractor workers work at the corporation's workplace, the chairman must take necessary safety and health measures to prevent industrial accidents among corporation workers and contractor workers. However, direct measures regarding the work behavior of recipient workers, such as instructions to wear protective gear, are excluded. [Fully revised on December 22, 2021]
